innovation.title: Effcient
innovation.content: Opening and closing position costs as much as an AMM token swap.

innovation.title: Transparency
innovation.content: No backend service. No permissoned roles. Everyone have the same right.

innovation.title: High Resistance
innovation.content: Price feed are protected against manipulations and flashloan.

innovation.title: Zero Trading Fee
innovation.content: Open and Close position cost nothing as Fee and Interest are charged over time.

innovation.title: Real Yield
innovation.content: Real service brings real profit. Pool reserve, fee and interest are paid from trader to LP and protocol using time-proven token reserve (ETH, BTC, etc.)

innovation.title: No Liquidation
innovation.content: Derivative positions (long/short) are power perpetual fungible token, which has compound leverage that never be liquidated. (ETH^x or ETH^-x value can never go negative).

innovation.title: Infinite Liquidity
innovation.content: Counter-party risks miltigated: LP is less exposed to the market volatility. Liquidity can never be exhausted.
